ImportKlgList.Name: There + (情态动词/助动词) + be动词 + 主语 + (...)
主句, whatever等加ever的连词 + 从句
主句, which + 从句其他部分

MainKlgList.Name: such + a/an + (形容词) + 单数可数名词

ChildList.ChildAsk:
世界上有各种各样的 (various) 主题 (theme) 公园。无论你参观哪一个公园，其独特的 (unique) 吸引人的地方 (attraction) 都将会给你留下深刻的印象。有些主题公园以卡通 (cartoon) 角色而闻名 (be famous for)，一些以少数民族 (minority) 文化而出名，一些以娱乐 (amusement) 而闻名。一些主题公园的建筑模仿 (be modelled after) 世界各地著名的建筑，你可以靠近 (get close to) 它们。一般来说，入场费合情合理。难怪 (no wonder that) 哪里有这样的公园，对当地的旅游业 (tourism) 和经济都有益。

______________________________
ChildList.ChildAnswer: There are various theme parks all over the world. Whichever park you visit, its unique attraction will impress you greatly. Some are famous for cartoons characters, some others for cultures from minorities, some just for amusement and so on. Some buildings of these parks are modelled after famous buildings all over the world, which you can get close to as you like. In general, the admission is reasonable. No wonder that wherever there is such a park, it is good for the local tourism and its economy.
ChildList.ChildFullAnswer: There are various theme parks all over the world. Whichever park you visit, its unique attraction will impress you greatly. Some are famous for cartoons characters, some others for cultures from minorities, some just for amusement and so on. Some buildings of these parks are modelled after famous buildings all over the world, which you can get close to as you like. In general, the admission is reasonable. No wonder that wherever there is such a park, it is good for the local tourism and its economy.

Some are famous for cartoons characters, some others for cultures from minorities, some just for amusement and so on. Some buildings of these parks are modelled after famous buildings all over the world, which you can get close to as you like. In general, the admission is reasonable. No wonder that wherever there is such a park, it is good for the local tourism and its economy.
ItemFullAnswer: There are various theme parks all over the world. Whichever park you visit, its unique attraction will impress you greatly. Some are famous for cartoons characters, some others for cultures from minorities, some just for amusement and so on. Some buildings of these parks are modelled after famous buildings all over the world, which you can get close to as you like. In general, the admission is reasonable. No wonder that wherever there is such a park, it is good for the local tourism and its economy.

QuesDetailList.QuesBrief: 世界上有各种各样的 (various) 主题 (theme) 公园。无论你参观哪一个公园，其独特的 (unique) 吸引人的地方 (attraction) 都将会给你留下深刻的印象。有些主题公园以卡通 (cartoon) 角色而闻名 (be famous for)，一些以少数民族 (minority) 文化而出名，一些以娱乐 (amusement) 而闻名。一些主题公园的建筑模仿 (be modelled after) 世界各地著名的建筑，你可以靠近 (get close to) 它们。一般来说，入场费合情合理。难怪 (no wonder that) 哪里有这样的公园，对当地的旅游业 (tourism) 和经济都有益。______________________________
